00052 struct AbstractTriggerCreator;
00053 typedef vector<shared_ptr<AbstractTriggerCreator> > triggerCollection;
00054 
00056 class AbstractConstraint
00057 {
00058 protected:
00060 
00061   StateObj* stateObj;
00062   MemOffset _DynamicTriggerCache;
00063   vector<AnyVarRef> singleton_vars;
00064 
00065 
00066 public:
00067 
00068   #ifdef WDEG
00069   unsigned int wdeg;
00070   #endif
00071 
00072   BOOL full_propagate_done;
00073 
00075   DynamicTrigger* dynamic_trigger_start()
00076     { return static_cast<DynamicTrigger*>(_DynamicTriggerCache.get_ptr()); }
00077 
00080   virtual int dynamic_trigger_count()
00081     { return 0; }
00082 
00085   virtual int dynamic_trigger_count_with_children()
00086     { return dynamic_trigger_count(); }
00087 
00089 
00090   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00091     { return triggerCollection(); }
00092 
00094 
00095   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger*)
00096     { D_FATAL_ERROR("Fatal error in 'Dynamic Propagate' in " + constraint_name()); }
00097 
00099 
00100   virtual void propagate(int, DomainDelta)
00101     { D_FATAL_ERROR("Fatal error in 'Static Propagate' in " + constraint_name()); }
00102 
00105 
00106   virtual BOOL full_check_unsat()
00107   {
00108     cerr << "Static reification is not supported by the " << constraint_name() << " constraint. Sorry" << endl;
00109     exit(1);
00110   }
00111 
00114 
00115   virtual BOOL check_unsat(int,DomainDelta)
00116   {
00117     cerr << "Static reification is not supported by the " << constraint_name() << " constraint. Sorry" << endl;
00118     exit(1);
00119   }
00120 
00122 
00125     virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00126   {
00127     cerr << "Finding assignment is not supported by the " << constraint_name() << " constraint. Sorry" << endl;
00128     exit(1);
00129   }
00130 
00132 
00133   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00134   {
00135     cerr << "Negation is not supported by the " << constraint_name() << " constraint. Sorry" << endl;
00136     exit(1);
00137   }

00139   AbstractConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj) :
00140     stateObj(_stateObj), _DynamicTriggerCache(), singleton_vars(),
00141 #ifdef WDEG
00142     wdeg(1),
00143 #endif
00144     full_propagate_done(false)
00145     {}
00146 
00148   virtual string constraint_name() = 0;
00149 
00151 
00152   virtual void full_propagate() = 0;
00153 
00154   // Returns the variables of the constraint
00155   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars() = 0;
00156 
00157   vector<AnyVarRef>* get_vars_singleton() //piggyback singleton vector on get_vars()
00158   {
00159     if(singleton_vars.size() == 0) singleton_vars = get_vars(); //for efficiency: no constraint over 0 variables
00160     return &singleton_vars;
00161   }
00162 
00163 #ifdef WDEG
00164   unsigned int getWdeg();
00165 
00166   void incWdeg();
00167 #endif
00168 
00169   // Weights the constraint for ordering in trigger lists (bigger is later)
00170   virtual int getTrigWeight()
00171   {
00172     return get_vars_singleton()->size();
00173   }
00174 
00177   virtual void special_check()
00178   {
00179     cerr << "Serious internal error" << endl;
00180     FAIL_EXIT();
00181   }
00182 
00183   // Called if failure occurs without actiating a special trigger, so the constraint can unlock.
00184   virtual void special_unlock()
00185   {
00186     cerr << "Serious internal error" << endl;
00187     FAIL_EXIT();
00188   }
00189 
00191 
00192   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size) = 0;
00193 
00194   virtual ~AbstractConstraint()
00195     {}
00196 
00197 
00198 
00199   virtual void setup_dynamic_triggers(MemOffset DynamicTriggerPointer)
00200     { _DynamicTriggerCache = DynamicTriggerPointer; }
00201 
00202 
00203   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal_gather_triggers()
00204     { return setup_internal(); }
00205 
00208   virtual void setup()
00209   {
00210     // Dynamic initialisation
00211     int trigs = dynamic_trigger_count();
00212     D_ASSERT(trigs >= 0);
00213     setup_dynamic_triggers(getMemory(stateObj).nonBackTrack().request_bytes((sizeof(DynamicTrigger) * trigs)));
00214 
00215     DynamicTrigger* start = dynamic_trigger_start();
00216     for(int i = 0 ; i < trigs; ++i)
00217       new (start+i) DynamicTrigger(this);
00218 
00219     // Static initialisation
00220     triggerCollection t = setup_internal_gather_triggers();
00221     for(triggerCollection::iterator it = t.begin(); it != t.end(); ++it)
00222     {
00223       (*it)->post_trigger();
00224     }
00225   }
00226 };
00227 
00229 class ParentConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00230 {
00231 protected:
00232   vector<AbstractConstraint*> child_constraints;
00233   // Maps a dynamic trigger to the constraint which it belongs to.
00234   vector<int> _dynamic_trigger_to_constraint;
00235   // Maps a static trigger to a pair { constraint, trigger for that constraint }
00236   vector< pair<int, int> > _static_trigger_to_constraint;
00237   // Maps variables to constraints
00238   vector<int> variable_to_constraint;
00239   // Gets start of each constraint
00240   vector<int> start_of_constraint;
00241 public:
00242 
00243   pair<int,int> getChildStaticTrigger(int i)
00244     { return _static_trigger_to_constraint[i]; }
00245 
00246   int getChildDynamicTrigger(DynamicTrigger* ptr)
00247   {
00248     return _dynamic_trigger_to_constraint[ptr - dynamic_trigger_start()];
00249   }
00250 
00252 
00253   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal_gather_triggers()
00254   {
00255     triggerCollection newTriggers;
00256 
00257     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); i++)
00258     {
00259       triggerCollection childTrigs = child_constraints[i]->setup_internal_gather_triggers();
00260       for(int j = 0; j < childTrigs.size(); ++j)
00261       {
00262         // Record each original trigger value, then add the modified trigger to the collection.
00263         _static_trigger_to_constraint.push_back(make_pair(i, childTrigs[j]->trigger.info));
00264         // Need a '-1' on the next line, as C++ containers are indexed from 0!
00265         childTrigs[j]->trigger.info = _static_trigger_to_constraint.size() - 1;
00266         childTrigs[j]->trigger.constraint = this;
00267         newTriggers.push_back(childTrigs[j]);
00268       }
00269     }
00270 
00271     triggerCollection parentTrigs = setup_internal();
00272     for(int i = 0; i < parentTrigs.size(); ++i)
00273       D_ASSERT(parentTrigs[i]->trigger.info < 0);
00274     newTriggers.insert(newTriggers.end(), parentTrigs.begin(), parentTrigs.end());
00275 
00276     return newTriggers;
00277   }
00278 
00279   ParentConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const vector<AbstractConstraint*> _children = vector<AbstractConstraint*>()) :
00280   AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), child_constraints(_children)
00281   {
00282     int var_count = 0;
00283     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00284     {
00285       start_of_constraint.push_back(var_count);
00286       int con_size = child_constraints[i]->get_vars_singleton()->size();
00287       for(int j = 0; j < con_size; ++j)
00288       {
00289         variable_to_constraint.push_back(i);
00290       }
00291       var_count += con_size;
00292     }
00293   }
00294 
00295   virtual int dynamic_trigger_count_with_children()
00296   {
00297     int trigger_count = dynamic_trigger_count();
00298     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00299       trigger_count += child_constraints[i]->dynamic_trigger_count_with_children();
00300     return trigger_count;
00301   }
00302 
00303   virtual void setup_dynamic_triggers(MemOffset dynamicTriggerPointer)
00304   {
00305     _DynamicTriggerCache = dynamicTriggerPointer;
00306 
00307     int current_trigger_count = dynamic_trigger_count();
00308 
00309     for(int count = 0; count < current_trigger_count; count++)
00310       _dynamic_trigger_to_constraint.push_back(child_constraints.size());
00311 
00312     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00313     {
00314       // We need this check to ensure we don't try constructing a "start of trigger" block one off the
00315       // the end of memory array.
00316       if(current_trigger_count == dynamic_trigger_count_with_children())
00317         return;
00318 
00319       // Get start child's dynamic triggers.
00320       MemOffset childPtr = dynamicTriggerPointer.getOffset(current_trigger_count * sizeof(DynamicTrigger));
00321       child_constraints[i]->setup_dynamic_triggers(childPtr);
00322 
00323       int child_trig_count = child_constraints[i]->dynamic_trigger_count_with_children();
00324 
00325       for(int count = current_trigger_count; count < current_trigger_count + child_trig_count; ++count)
00326         _dynamic_trigger_to_constraint.push_back(i);
00327 
00328       current_trigger_count += child_trig_count;
00329     }
00330   }
00331 
00334   virtual void setup()
00335   {
00336     // Dynamic initialisation
00337     int all_trigs = dynamic_trigger_count_with_children();
00338 
00339     D_DATA(int trigs = dynamic_trigger_count());
00340     D_ASSERT(trigs >= 0);
00341     D_ASSERT(all_trigs >= trigs);
00342 
00343     MemOffset trigMem = getMemory(stateObj).nonBackTrack().request_bytes(sizeof(DynamicTrigger) * all_trigs);
00344 
00345     // Start by allocating triggers in the memory block
00346     DynamicTrigger* start = static_cast<DynamicTrigger*>(trigMem.get_ptr());
00347     for(int i = 0 ; i < all_trigs; ++i)
00348       new (start+i) DynamicTrigger(this);
00349 
00350     setup_dynamic_triggers(trigMem);
00351 
00352     // Static initialisation
00353     triggerCollection t = setup_internal_gather_triggers();
00354     for(triggerCollection::iterator it = t.begin(); it != t.end(); ++it)
00355     {
00356       (*it)->post_trigger();
00357     }
00358   }
00359 
00360   virtual ~ParentConstraint()
00361   {
00362     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00363       delete child_constraints[i];
00364   }
00365 };

00369 #endif
